name: resuscitated

definition: the act of reviving a person and returning them to consciousness
name: resuscitation
examples: although he was apparently drowned, resuscitation was accomplished by artificial respiration

definition: a breathing apparatus used for resuscitation by forcing oxygen into the lungs of a person who has undergone asphyxia or arrest of respiration
name: resuscitator

definition: put back into suspension
name: resuspend
examples: resuspend particles

definition: a renewed suspension of insoluble particles after they have been precipitated
name: resuspension

definition: place (flax, hemp, or jute) in liquid so as to promote loosening of the fibers from the woody tissue
name: ret

definition: the selling of goods to consumers; usually in small quantities and not for resale
name: retail

definition: be sold at the retail level
name: retail
examples: These gems retail at thousands of dollars each

definition: sell on the retail market
name: retail

definition: at a retail price
name: retail
examples: I'll sell it to you retail only

definition: a chain of retail stores
name: retail chain

definition: a merchant who sells goods at retail
name: retail merchant

definition: an index of changes in retail prices
name: retail price index

definition: a place of business for retailing goods
name: retail store

definition: a merchant who sells goods at retail
name: retailer

definition: the activities involved in selling commodities directly to consumers
name: retailing

definition: hold back within
name: retain
examples: This soil retains water
I retain this drug for a long time
the dam retains the water

definition: allow to remain in a place or position or maintain a property or feature
name: retain
examples: She retains a lawyer
She retained her composure
this garment retains its shape even after many washings

definition: secure and keep for possible future use or application
name: retain
examples: The landlord retained the security deposit

definition: keep in one's mind
name: retain
examples: I cannot retain so much information

definition: continued in your keeping or use or memory
name: retained
examples: in...the retained pattern of dancers and guests remembered

definition: an object in a passive construction
name: retained object
